TopicTitle: Shader glow remover - Toggle the hover over green glow while in EVA/flight mode

Articles.Content:
I was asking around on this page to see if anyone had found a way to disable the green highlight shader and it appears as though the only mod which did so, is now outdated. Would someone make a mod which uses the updated KSP shaders to disable the green glow? I know I'm not the only video maker who would die for the option. Is a modder willing to try and find a fix for this? There will be rep! Much, much rep. And video promotions.

- Joe Hafner

Edited April 20, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

Here you are Avera9eJoe. I just wrote a new one, and it should disable highlighting on all vessels.

Direct download to just the mod: https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases/download/v01.00/HighlighterOff.zip

And the obligatory source repository: https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases

License is included in the download.

Cheers,

~Claw
